HomePage.title: Starter Template
HomePage.metaTitle: Starter Template — Next.js with SSG, SEO & i18n
HomePage.metaDescription: A Next.js starter template with static generation, SEO metadata, JSON-LD, and internationalization. Ready to customize.
HomePage.tagline: A Next.js starter with SSG, SEO, and i18n — ready to customize.
HomePage.introBody: This starter demonstrates SSG (static site generation), SEO with metadata and JSON-LD, and a simple i18n setup. Use it as a blueprint for your next project.

AboutPage.metaDescription: Learn about this starter template and how to use it for your project.
AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.body1: This is a starter template and example site. It showcases static generation (SSG), SEO best practices, and internationalization.
AboutPage.body2: Use this blueprint to create your own apps with proper metadata, sitemaps, and accessibility in mind.
